title: Night of the Sentinels: Part 1
episode_desc: A young teenager has been rejecting her mutant powers ever since she discovered them. But when giant robots track her down, it's up to the X-Men to save her.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Night of the Sentinels: Part 2
episode_desc: After breaking into the headquarters of the newly discovered government branch called The Mutant Control Agency, the X-men lose two of their own members in a battle with the Sentinels.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Enter Magneto
episode_desc: As the Beast waits for his arraignment in court in front of an anti-mutant public, Magneto tries to break Beast out of jail, only to receive resistance from Beast. An old enemy of Wolverine's pops up, and the X-Men take him in. Magneto then attacks a military base, trying to bring mutants together against the oppression brought upon.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Deadly Reunions
episode_desc: Professor Xavier and Magneto confront each other for the first time in years, meanwhile Wolverine and Sabretooth come face to face. Professor Xavier tries to examine Sabretooth's mind to figure out his rage problem. After his last terrorist action failed, Magneto plots a new one to bring Professor Xavier out into the open. Sabretooth and Wolverine confront each other in the mansion's war room.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Captive Hearts
episode_desc: Wolverine has strong feeling for Jean Grey, but she's with Cyclops. Storm has a paralyzing case of claustrophobia and must overcome this as the X-Men venture into the New York sewers to rescue Jean Grey and Cyclops from a deformed race of mutants called the Morlocks. Storm confronts the leader of the Morlocks, Callisto, who wants Cyclops to rule beside her as king.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Cold Vengeance
episode_desc: After leaving the X-Men, Wolverine looks for solitude in the arctic, but comes across Sabretooth, who's been tracking him. When the safety of a local tribe is threatened by Sabretooth, Wolverine must defeat him. Meanwhile Jubilee, Storm and Gambit do some investigating at an island resort called Genosha that seems to be a safe haven for mutants.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Slave Island
episode_desc: Gambit, Storm, and Jubilee head to the island resort of Genosha... and end up as mutant slaves.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: The Unstoppable Juggernaut
episode_desc: The X-Men discover their home destroyed and Professor X missing. Their search leads them to a titanic mutant who can become an unstoppable force.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: The Cure
episode_desc: Rogue seeks a scientist who claims to be able to "cure" any mutant of their powers. But is he for real?
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Come the Apocalypse
episode_desc: An ancient and immensely powerful mutant called Apocalypse plots to destroy the world to bring in a newer more world.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Days of Future Past: Part 1
episode_desc: The mutant travels back in time to avert a future catastrophe.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Days of Future Past: Part 2
episode_desc: Gambit sets out to prove his innocence by thwarting an assassination he supposedly caused. Can he succeed?
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: The Final Decision
episode_desc: Senator Kelly has been abducted by Magneto and given the facts about Magneto's goals of superiority of mutants over humans, the X-men's beliefs of peaceful co-existence between both races, and the Sentinel's plans of global domination. And must make a decision of his future plans in politics based on this information.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: 'Til Death Do Us Part: Part 1
episode_desc: Jean and Scott get married. Newly elected President Kelly has freed Beast who has been incarcerated since the attack on government facility at the beginning of Season 1 and added him as part of his Presidential cabinet. Another friend who was thought to be dead at the same incident has resurfaced, but this time he's not so friendly. With the President's newly found pro-mutant point of view, the public feels betrayed are reacting with violence.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: 'Til Death Do Us Part: Part 2
episode_desc: Scott and Jean are on their way to a secluded island for their honeymoon, but gets cut short by Mister Sinister. As Morph continues with his plans of revenge against the X-Men, he starts losing his motivation. But Mister Sinister makes sure he finishes what he started. The Friends of Humanity have began to rally.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Whatever It Takes
episode_desc: Storm recovers from her injuries and returns to her duty as leader of the X-Men. When a tear in the astral plane appears in Africa, Storm goes there to investigate. It just so happens that the tear is in her home village. Meanwhile Xavier and Magneto are lured to the Savage Land in Antarctica and Wolverine continues his search for Morph.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Red Dawn
episode_desc: Colossus returns home to Russia with Jubilee by his side. They are confronted by a newly revived Russian, life force absorbing, super soldier from the cold war, named Omega Red, who has a bad history with Wolverine. Xavier and Magneto continue their treacherous journey through the Savage Land.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Repo Man
episode_desc: After Wolverine has been lured to Canada by an alleged message from his old friend, Heather Hudson, he finds himself fighting Heather's husband, Vindicator, and the Canadian super team, Alpha Flight, instead. Alpha Flight believes that they were only sent after Wolverine to get him to rejoin their team. However, their General Chasen has a more sinister agenda: to retrieve Wolverine's adamantium skeleton -- at any cost.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: X-Ternally Yours
episode_desc: Every ten years, The Assassins Guild and The Thieves Guild must each give an offering to a supernatural being called The X-Ternal, in exchange for power. When it comes to be Gambit's brother, Bobby, who has to offer the tithing this time, he comes up missing. The Assassins Guild want to exchange him for Gambit, so he can finally come face to face with the woman he left at the altar 10 years before.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Time Fugitives: Part 1
episode_desc: Bishop returns from the future to again attempt to fix his world, but this time his actions lead up to a far greater tragedy occurring.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Time Fugitives: Part 2
episode_desc: To stabilize his own timeline, Cable comes to the present to prevent Bishop from saving mutant-kind from Apocalypse's plague.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: A Rogue's Tale
episode_desc: Mr. Sinister send Mystique to destroy the X-Men while Professor X is lost in the Savage Land. Rogue starts having painful visions of a mysterious woman and they're literally driving her crazy when the mysterious woman possesses Rogue's body. Unknown to the X-men, this mystery woman holds some dark secrets to Rogue's past before she joined the X-Men.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Beauty and the Beast
episode_desc: The Friends Of Humanity attack a hospital for the blind that Beast is working at. And Wolverine plans on tearing them apart from the inside. Beast and one of his blind patients, Carly, fall in love together. But Carly's father is a mutant hater and won't stand to see them associating with each other. When the Friends Of Humanity kidnap Carly for associating with a mutant, Wolverine, Beast, and the FOH come full circle. Meanwhile, in the Savage Land, Xavier and Magneto are struggling to survive.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Mojovision
episode_desc: On a world ruled by Television, an alien named Mojo is master. When he abducts the X-Men and forces them to be action heroes in his shows, he may have to deal with more than he bargained for when Mojo's original action hero sabotages him. Xavier and Magneto are still slowly making their way through the Savage Land.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Reunion: Part 1
episode_desc: Xavier and Magneto finally make their way back to Xavier's plane, only to be ambushed by some mutates. The new ruler of the Savage Land is revealed but not until they make a new ally. Morph sends a message to the X-Men revealing his location which provides an encounter with Mr. Sinister and his group of Nasty Boys.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Reunion: Part 2
episode_desc: The X-Men are now in the Savage Land and are powerless like Xavier and Magneto, which leaves the X-Men open to being experimented on by Mr. Sinister. The only ones left to rescue them are Ka-Zar and Wolverine. Once everyone regains their powers, the Savage Land is restored. But what does the future hold for the Savage Land now?
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Out of the Past: Part 1
episode_desc: Wolverine is lured into the Morlock tunnels by a former lover who is accompanied by a group of cybernetic mercenaries called Reavers. Wolverine discovers this woman he used to love isn't the woman he once knew, as she's gone through the same cybernetic alterations that the Reavers have, and a new moniker, calling herself Lady Deathstrike. She has discovered a long buried alien craft and needs Wolverine's adamantium claws to cut it open.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Out of the Past: Part 2
episode_desc: After being released from an alien spacecraft, a being called the Spirit Drinker starts draining the life force of the people around it, including The Reavers, Lady Deathstrike and Jubilee. Can the X-Men figure out the secret of destroying it before the drained life forces are gone forever?
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Phoenix Saga, Part 1: Sacrifice
episode_desc: Professor X's visions leads to his decision to blindly send the team to commandeer a space shuttle on which they are then attacked by Shi'ar agent Erik The Red who has plans to ambush the rebel, Lilandra when she exits a space wormhole. Jean Grey experiences a transformation as the shuttle travels through an energy field.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Phoenix Saga, Part 2: Dark Shroud
episode_desc: A psychic probe in the form of a beam of light causes Professor X's to emit a psychic projection of his dark side which then attacks the X-Men. Professor X retreats to Muir Island for rehabilitation but is visited by Lilandra.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Phoenix Saga, Part 3: Cry of the Banshee
episode_desc: Juggernaut and Black Tom Cassidy kidnap Lilandra for Erik The Red but the X-Men track them down. A fight results in a stalemate until Gladiator, guard to the imperial throne, shows up to take Lilandra captive. Phoenix rescues her and vanquishes Gladiator for the meantime.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Phoenix Saga, Part 4: Starjammers
episode_desc: The X-Men fail to protect the M'Kraan Crystal from intergalactic pirates called Starjammers who plan to sell it to D'Ken as well as to use Cyclops as an assassin. Phoenix transports the X-Men to the crystal but D'Ken succeeds in unlocking it's power.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Phoenix Saga, Part 5: Child of Light
episode_desc: The X-Men are drawn in to battle against D'Ken within the confines of the world within the M'Kraan Crystal where Phoenix makes a last stand.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Savage Land, Strange Heart: Part 1
episode_desc: Separated from the rest of the X-Men, Storm is encouraged by Sauron to free her inner tempest of energy, awakening Garokk.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Savage Land, Strange Heart: Part 2
episode_desc: Garokk fuses with the island's volcano and the surging planetary force below it.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Obsession
episode_desc: Archangel has become obsessed with destroying Apocalypse, who he blames for ruining his life.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: The Dark Phoenix: Part 1 - Dazzled
episode_desc: Jean is beginning to lose control, and the Phoenix begins to brazenly take over at will.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: The Dark Phoenix: Part 2 - Inner Circle
episode_desc: When Mastermind tries to force Phoenix to kill Cyclops, she finally breaks free of the psychic controls on her, leaving the X-Men to fight for themselves.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: The Dark Phoenix: Part 3 - Dark Phoenix
episode_desc: Jean Grey, now completely part of the Phoenix, returns to her childhood home, overwhelmed by too much emotion and too much power.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: The Dark Phoenix: Part 4 - The Fate of Phoenix
episode_desc: Xavier reads Lilandra's mind and challenges her guard to the Duel of Honor that Lilandra cannot refuse for Jean Grey's life.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Cold Comfort
episode_desc: Iceman, a former X-Man, is caught sneaking into a federal warehouse. He is captured by his former team, but Jubilee tries to help him.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Orphan's End
episode_desc: Corsair is on the run from Shi'Ar authorities, who demand that Cyclops turn him over to them.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: The Juggernaut Returns
episode_desc: Juggernaut's life is at risk when someone else uncovers the Ruby of Cyttorak and claims the powers of Juggernaut for himself.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Nightcrawler
episode_desc: On holiday, Rogue, Gambit and Wolverine must protect Nightcrawler, a demonic-looking but kind-hearted monk, from a misled community.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Weapon X, Lies, and Video Tape
episode_desc: Wolverine discovers everything about his past life in the government program Weapon X was a lie... including his love affair with Silver Fox.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: One Man's Worth: Part 1
episode_desc: Trevor Fitzroy and Bantam travel back in time to 1959 and kill Professor X.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: One Man's Worth: Part 2
episode_desc: Failing to stop the assassination of Xavier, Bishop, Shard, Storm and Wolverine travel forward to the future.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Courage
episode_desc: Morph and Wolverine investigate and discover that the Sentinels are back.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Proteus: Part 1
episode_desc: Moira MacTaggert is trying to help her son, but when he escapes from Muir Island she calls on the X-Men for help.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Proteus: Part 2
episode_desc: Angered at his father's reaction, Proteus creates havoc, but Professor X later calms him down, and he stops the rampage.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Sanctuary: Part 1
episode_desc: Weary of battling for mutant supremacy, Magneto offers to transport all mutants to an orbiting asteroid named Asteroid M where they can live peaceful and human-free lives.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Sanctuary: Part 2
episode_desc: As Magneto plummets helplessly to Earth, Fabian Cortez assumes control of Asteroid M and sends hundreds of missiles towards Earth.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Beyond Good and Evil: Part 1
episode_desc: In the year 3999, Apocalypse steals Cable's computer and time-travels to the past in order to end his struggle against inferior mutants permanently.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Beyond Good and Evil: Part 2
episode_desc: The next phase of Apocalypse's plan begins: he targets and abducts the most powerful psychics in the universe.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Beyond Good and Evil: Part 3
episode_desc: Cable appears in the past to stop Apocalypse, but is not concerned about saving the psychics much to the mutants' chagrin.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Beyond Good and Evil: Part 4
episode_desc: The final battle between mutants and Apocalypse takes place.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Have Yourself a Morlock Little X-Mas
episode_desc: Storm, and grouchy humbug Wolverine go last-minute shopping in Manhattan, only to be caught in a life-or-death crisis involving Leech, the littlest Morlock.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Lotus and the Steel
episode_desc: Wolverine heads to Japan for some solitude and soul-searching. But he finds his Japanese friends under siege by a gang of bandits.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Love in Vain
episode_desc: In a New Mexico desert, Wolverine witnesses the crash of a spaceship carrying horrific, alien bug-like creatures--the Colony.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Secrets, Not Long Buried
episode_desc: When Cyclops flies solo to a tiny, western, desert community to see an old friend, his plane is blasted out of the sky. Injured and unable to use his powers, he struggles into town, only to discover his friend is missing and the town is caught in the grips of a militant, mutant-only, anti-human hate group: the Children of the Shadow. The Children of the Shadow hunt him down. When his powers return, Cyclops gets help from some mutants and defeats them.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Xavier Remembers
episode_desc: When Professor X suffers a slight concussion, his powerful psychic mind is suddenly open to manipulation.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Family Ties
episode_desc: Pietro Maximoff AKA Quicksilver of the mutant team X-Factor and his sister, Wanda, The Scarlet Witch of the Avengers, learn from their dying father, that they were adopted. Magneto, who is looking for his estranged wife, may hold a clue to the Maxinoff twins' past.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Phalanx Covenant: Part 1
episode_desc: The X-Men are attacked by the Phalanx, a race of techno-organic aliens seeking to assimilate all life on earth.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: The Phalanx Covenant: Part 2
episode_desc: The X-Men are attacked by the Phalanx, and are trying to find help but Magneto at first sees this as his chance to watch humanity go down.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: A Deal with the Devil
episode_desc: Omega Red, the destruction machine from the former Soviet Union and a sworn enemy of Wolverine, is thawed and sent two miles beneath the ocean to salvage a disabled, toxic nuclear submarine threatening to break up near Hawaii.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: No Mutant Is an Island
episode_desc: A disillusioned Cyclops leaves the X-Men and returns to the orphanage where he grew up, only to find it under the control of a mind-controlling mutant.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Longshot
episode_desc: Mojo uses Jubilee as a 'prize' to lure Longshot and the X-Men into a deadly contest which Mojo broadcasts 'live' to raise ratings.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Bloodlines
episode_desc: Nightcrawler finally meets the mother who gave him up... Mystique.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Storm Front: Part 1
episode_desc: The alien Arkon comes to Earth and begs Storm to return with him to his planet, to save it from meteorological chaos which threatens his people.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Storm Front: Part 2
episode_desc: Spectacular preparations for Storm's wedding to Arkon proceed quickly.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Jubilee's Fairytale Theater
episode_desc: Jubilee and a group of children are trapped by a cave-in in the caverns underneath the Xavier Mansion, she tells a fairy tale to kill time while they wait to be rescued.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: The Fifth Horseman
episode_desc: Fabian Cortez kidnaps Jubilee because Apocalypse is trapped in Astral Plane and needs a host body.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Old Soldiers
episode_desc: While visiting the grave of a friend in an Army Cemetary in France, Wolverine remembers a mission he did for him, while battling the Nazis and Red Skull with none other than Captain America on his side.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Descent
episode_desc: The origin of Mr. Sinister is revealed, as Dr. Xavier attempts to stop Essex before he goes too far.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Hidden Agendas
episode_desc: Sam Guthrie's parents have contacted Professor Xavier about their son's mutant powers.
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.

title: Graduation Day
episode_desc: On the verge of Magneto's final stand against humans, the X-Men request him to save a dying Professor X. What choice will he make?
show_desc: A team of mutant superheroes fight for justice and human acceptance in the Marvel Comics universe.
